system.description:
Effect: The user gains an Ability the target has for the remainder of the encounter or until switched out. If the target has more than one Ability, the user chooses which one they gain. The user may also select 1 ally in range to gain the Ability instead.

Only one Ability can be gained this way. If Doodle is used to gain a new Ability, the old Ability is forgotten.
